page.title: 13Clay Pigeon Shoots
page.content: Shoot. On Sunday June 16th, the monthly clay pigeon shoot was held at Lowe's Farm. I went to watch Dad shoot. Dad was picked up by his friend Eric. I had to go on my bike so dad and his friends could go to the Three Greyhounds afterwards. When we arrived we signed in. In our group were Mr Radcliffe, Eric, Neil, Brian and Dad. It was a 50 bird shoot. We went in the wood where the first stand was a fur and feathers. There were 5 pairs on it. The next was a 5 pairs and it was a bolting rabbit. On number 4 the clays went between two trees and was worth 5 points. The last stand was a sitting duck. Dad came first.
